h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)
content: Unfortunately, it won't be long before the Macaque Chief makes an effort to rectify this, and takes to the air. He'll then send out two shadow versions of himself to fly down and strike you, but they actually stick around to fight!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, it won't be long before the Macaque Chief makes an effort to rectify this, and takes to the air. He'll then send out two shadow versions of himself to fly down and strike you, but they actually stick around to fight!
